title: NEL service disruption due to train fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 列车故障导致 NEL 服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan NEL kerana kerosakan kereta api
title_translations.ta: ரயில் கோளாறு காரணமாக NEL சேவை சீர்குலைவு

updates.text:
1.00pm: NEL delay - Full train svc has resumed. We are sorry for the 
inconvenience caused.

12.39pm: NEL svc towards PunggoL NE17 is delayed due to a train fault at 
Sengkang NE16. Add travel time of about 15 minutes may be expected both bound. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
